channel.title: How to make a fake wound
channel.description:
This is realistic,even fooled me folks. 1)take a red marker,permeneant,and colour a thick line onto your skin 2)take it again and make some other links leading towards the line you make earlier. Like this ,see --------> -|- 3)do this as soon as possible after you put on the marker:dab some water on it and rub it as hard as possible. 4)done!!!!!!!!!!
Of course it may not work but it looks like someone scratched you quite hard. Hope you enjoy! :)

item.title: How to make a fake wound
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:20, topic:9164”]Why would you want to make a fake wound? I’ve had plenty of wounds. Last thing I want is another one. I jsut healed after my huge wound on my knee. If you don’t believe me, I’d be more then glad to show you pictures.[/quote]How about a pic of you? Seen tons of other senior members, but not you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining

If you want to look like you mutilate yourself, don’t fake it. My way is much better and is (nearly) painless, yet greatly satisfying. <3 pins.

item.title: How to make a fake wound
item.dc:creator: @ghostboy195 ghostboy195
item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

i’ve got an even better way.
Step one: find a sharp knife
Step two: stab your arm with the sharp knife
step three: drag the knife alittle, stretching the wound
step four: take out the knife
step five: show your parents

EDIT: THIS POST WAS MENT AS A JOKE, I AM NOT LIABLE IF YOU TRY THIS AND HURT YOURSELF

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a fake wound
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Or, take a red pen apart and put your mouth on one end of the tube, and blow the ink out of the other end into your skin. Then just add a bit of water so it’s not so thick.

item.title: How to make a fake wound
item.dc:creator: @ghostboy195 ghostboy195
item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

seems kind of fake to me. what i did was on the fourth of july, i put some katchup in my hand. my friend lit a fire cracker by me (not close enough to hurt me tho) and when it exploded i slamed my katchup hand up into my eye and started screaming. my friends mom started freaking out lol. she thought it was real because it was dark out and it looked real. that was one of my favorite 3rd of july’s ever (they were going away on the 4th so they lit theirs off on the 3rd)
ps, sorry if this makes no sence

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a fake wound
